revisions.comment: Replacing 1 archive.today link with Wayback Machine alternative per [[WP:ATODAY]] (via [https://github.com/nethahussain/wikipedia-archive-today-detector AT Detector])

Undid revision [[Special:Diff/1333118710|1333118710]] by [[Special:Contributions/ValWinter|ValWinter]] ([[User talk:ValWinter|talk]]) thanks for the suggestion, but this seems to be overly specific for this broad overview article and might fit better into a child article on a more narrow topic
/* Art and law */ added image and content about cultural destruction to give an example of why there are laws to protect art

“The science of art” section added, before “Art and law.”  Artkids could use all the [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rlo970tErFw?si=https://redd.it/losrc94 2=x=2] encouragement they can get?  Artkids are indulging [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r_8ydghbGSg?si=https://redd.it/oilocr 2=x=2] mental illness, and should be liable to compulsory pharmaceutical rebalancing?
